meanings.definition: A type of aromatic compound found in essential oils.
meanings.sent1: The linalools in the lavender oil give it a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: Essential oils often contain linalools that contribute to their fragrance.
meanings.sent3: The linalools in the air made the room smell like a field of flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was so strong, it seemed to be made entirely of linalools.
meanings.sent5: The linalools danced in the air, creating a sweet aroma around her.

meanings.definition: The plural form of linalool, a fragrant alcohol.
meanings.sent1: I bought several bottles of linalools to use in my homemade scented candles.
meanings.sent2: The linalools in the store were displayed in beautiful glass containers.
meanings.sent3: When I opened the cabinet, a cascade of linalools bottles fell out!
meanings.sent4: The linalools on the shelf shimmered like a rainbow of scents.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sweet aroma of linalools, creating a cozy atmosphere.
